EmailTemplate.name: Digital First.4-21-21 DBNK DF Email 8.Email 8
EmailTemplate.subject: Replay: Listen to Our Digital-First Banking Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In case you missed it, here’s your replay of our digital-first banking webinar: Omnichannel Confidential: Defining Digital-First in Today’s World.
It explores the insights you need to accelerate your digital-first banking strategy.
You’ll uncover what digital-first really means, learn about the financial wellness features consumers want and hear real-world digital transformation success stories. ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
